title: Planted Duck Asian Style
instructions: Heat a wok or large pan over high heat with sesame oil until smoking.
Add the planted.duck pieces and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until crispy and caramelized on the edges.
Create the glaze by mixing hoisin sauce, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and a touch of maple syrup in a small bowl.
Pour the glaze over the duck and toss to coat evenly, cooking for another 1-2 minutes until sticky.
Serve over jasmine rice or noodles, garnished with sliced spring onions, sesame seeds, and fresh cilantro.
